title: i CAN'T WAIT TO HAVE THE OLD FIORA SKILLS BACK!  i'M SO HAPPY!
body:
This is the coolest thing ever!

The old Fiora back?!  Really?!

I LOVED the old Fiora!

This news really just made my day!

Thank you Riot for making a twin sister Fiora with the skills of the old one!

replies.body: Huh? What on earth are you talking about?
You are as delusional as ever.
